document_data.name: ''Trollkiller Sword''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Trollkiller swords''''' were a type of [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[longsword]].
document_data.Powers: These swords typically had a ''+1 enchantment'', accompanied by either a ''+5 enchantment'' against [[troll]]s or the [[flaming]] [[weapon quality|quality]].
document_data.Availability:
These swords could be found for purchase at:
* The settlement of [[Kuldahar]].
* The city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.History: These swords were once exclusively associated with the city of Waterdeep. By {{Yearlink|1367}},<ref> they had became a rather common [[magical item]] in [[Faer√ªn]].
